questions.title: 你不会从你儿子生下来起就独自一人抚养吧。
questions.answer: Don't tell me you have been bringing up your son yourself when he wasborn.

questions.title: 你不会和你女朋友分手了吧，你们才相处了十天啊。
questions.answer: Don't tell me you broke up with your girlfriend, you have just gotten upfor ten days.

questions.title: 好冷啊。你不会就穿了一件外套吧。
questions.answer: It's so cold.Don't tell me you just wear a piece of coat.

questions.title: 你不会对你的家庭充满仇恨吧！
questions.answer: Don't tell me you are filled with hate for your family！

title: ——你不会已经把那只爱马仕的包买了吧。
——我已经想要了半年了。

answer.en: Don't tell me you have bought that Hermes's bag.
I have wanted it for half a year.

title: ——不要告诉我你还留恋过去。
——有时我们需要回头看看过去。

answer.en: Don't tell me you care about the things which once happened.
Sometimes we need to look back.

title: ——你不会已经把我的巧克力蛋糕全吃完了吧。
——太好吃了！

answer.en: Don't tell me you have eaten up my chocolate cake.
